title.rendered: Mandatory notification of trade in Aqualis ASA

content.rendered:
Reference is made to the stock exchange notice 26 June 2015 regarding the employee share purchase scheme. The following primary insiders have ordered shares:

Amish Ramesh Chandra Sanghavi, Group controller in Aqualis, ordered 14 654 shares on 25 June 2015. After completion Amish Ramesh Chandra Sanghavi and related parties will hold 138 832 shares in Aqualis ASA.

Bader Diab, Director of Engineering and North America in Aqualis, ordered 6 654 shares on 25 June 2015. After completion Bader Diab and related parties will hold 821 302 shares in Aqualis ASA.

Bjørn Håvard Brænden, Director Norway in Aqualis, ordered 6 654 shares on 26 June 2015. After completion Bjørn Håvard Brænden and related parties will hold 298 985 shares in Aqualis ASA.

Cherry Lenox, related party to Phil Lenox, Director Asia Pacific in Aqualis, ordered 6 654 shares on 25 June 2015. After completion Cherry Lenox and related parties will hold 885 598 shares in Aqualis ASA.

David Wells, CEO of Aqualis, ordered 6 654 shares on 25 June 2015. After completion David Wells and related parties will hold 646 776 shares in Aqualis ASA.

Santosh George, Group QHSE manager in Aqualis, ordered 6 654 shares on 25 June 2015. After completion Santosh Thomas George and related parties will hold 74 546 shares in Aqualis ASA.

Stuart Ronald Arthur Mill, Group contract manager in Aqualis, ordered 6 654 shares on 25 June 2015. After completion Stuart Ronald Arthur Mill and related parties will hold 39 665 shares in Aqualis ASA.

All shares have been ordered at NOK 7,5135 per share and otherwise on the terms of the employee share purchase scheme referred to in the stock exchange notice of 20 April 2015 and 26 June 2015.
